Scanhead

Contains logic for interacting with the Precsys Scanhead

Functions
GasOn
call Scanhead.GasOn();

Turns on the cover gas.

GasOff
call Scanhead.GasOff();

Turns off the cover gas.

SetGasFlow
call Scanhead.SetGasFlow(
NORMAL
);

Controls cover gas output psi.

Parameters mode Cover gas output mode

Defined Gas Flows NORMAL default cover gas flow LOW  restricted cover gas flow

VacuumOn
call Scanhead.VacuumOn();

Turns on the vacuum.

VacuumOff
call Scanhead.VacuumOff();

Turns off the vacuum.

AbortJob
call Scanhead.AbortJob();

Stops an executing job.

StartJob
call Scanhead.StartJob();

Starts the next enqueued job then returns control. Job execution can be stopped with Scanhead.AbortJob function.

See Also

  • Scanhead.AbortJob

ExecuteJob
call Scanhead.ExecuteJob();

Starts the job at the front of the execution queue, waits for job completion, then returns control.

ExecuteAndEnqueueJobList
call Scanhead.ExecuteAndEnqueueJobList(
jobListName
);

Starts the job at the front of the queue and enqueues the desired joblist. The function returns when the job is finished and the next joblist is enqueued.

Parameters
jobListName

(string) the name of the joblist to be enqueued

ExecuteAndEnqueueJob
call Scanhead.ExecuteAndEnqueueJob(
jobListName,
jobName
);

Starts the job at the front of the queue and enqueues the desired job. The function returns when the job is finished and the next job is enqueued.

Parameters
jobListName

(string) the name of the jobList containing the job to be enqueued

jobName

(string) the name of the job to be enqueued

ResetQueue
call Scanhead.ResetQueue();

Clears the execution queue and resets current errors.

AddAndQueueJobList
call Scanhead.AddAndQueueJobList(
filepath
);

Adds and enqueues a joblist to the controller.

Parameters
filepath

(string) path to the joblist to be enqueued

AddAndQueueJob
call Scanhead.AddAndQueueJob(
jobName,
filepath
);

Adds and enqueues a job to the controller.

Parameters
jobName

(string) name of the job within the passed in joblist to be added

filepath

(string) path to the joblist containing the job to be added

AddJob
call Scanhead.AddJob(
jobName,
filepath
);

Adds a job to the controller.

Parameters
jobName

(string) name of the job within the passed in joblist to be added

filepath

(string) path to the joblist containing the job to be added

AddJobList
call Scanhead.AddJobList(
filepath
);

Adds a joblist to the controller.

Parameters
filepath

(string) filepath to the joblist to be added

RemoveJob
call Scanhead.RemoveJob(
jobListName,
jobName
);

Removes a job from the controller.

Parameters
jobListName

(string) name of the joblist containing the job to be removed from the controller

jobName

(string) name of the job to be removed from the controller

RemoveJobList
call Scanhead.RemoveJobList(
jobListName
);

Removes a joblist from the controller.

Parameters
jobListName

(string) name of the joblist to be removed from the controller

RemoveAllJobLists
call Scanhead.RemoveAllJobLists();

Removes all joblist from the controller.

EnqueueJobList
call Scanhead.EnqueueJobList(
jobListName
);

Enqueues all the jobs in an added joblist into the execution queue.

Parameters
jobListName

(string) name of the joblist to be enqueued

EnqueueJob
call Scanhead.EnqueueJob(
jobListName,
jobName
);

Enqueues a job in an added joblist into the execution queue.

Parameters
jobListName

(string) name of the joblist containing the job to be enqueued

jobName

(string) name of the job to be enqueued

EnqueueJobListAsync
call Scanhead.EnqueueJobListAsync(
jobListName
);

Starts enqueueing a joblist and returns execution to the program before the joblist is finished enqueueing

Parameters
jobListName

(string) name of the joblist to be enqueued

See Also

  • Scanhead.IsJoblistQueueing

EnqueueJobAsync

Starts enqueueing a job and returns execution to the program before the job is finished enqueueing

Parameters
jobListName

(string) name of the joblist containing the job to be enqueued

jobName

(string) name of the job to be enqueued

See Also

  • Scanhead.IsJoblistQueueing

IsJoblistQueueing
call Scanhead.IsJoblistQueueing(
&isQueueing
);

Starts enqueueing a job and returns execution to the program before the job is finished enqueueing

Response Parameters
&isQueueing

true if joblist is done enqueueing

See Also

  • Scanhead.EnqueueJobAsync

  • Scanhead.EnqueueJobListAsync

GetCurrentGasPressure
call Scanhead.GetCurrentGasPressure(
&currentPressure
);

Gets the current cover gas pressure in PSI

Response Parameters
&currentPressure

cover gas pressure in PSI
